name: borg
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] a thick, soft, artificial material used for making clothes that looks similar to sheepskin (= the skin of a sheep with wool on one side): The hoodies are lined with borg, which makes them super warm for winter. a borg jacket
adisa/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
[ C ] a jacket or coat made from borg: At £20, this is the best-value borg we've seen.
adisa/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
